actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Flood Insurance Program Reauthorization and Reform Act of 2025
